website_summaries.verdict: The affordable IRIScan Mouse Executive 2 is a capable and accurate combination mouse and scanner ideal for tethering to your laptop while traveling.
pros: Strong software bundle with cloud and business card archiving
cons: Uses USB cable instead of wireless connection

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mouse and very handy as a portable scanner. Very easy to instal on my Mac computers and was used for scanning A3 sized plans which it did well on the medium intensity scan. It ran out of memory on a high quality scan but OK results with medium scan. I don't know why anyone hasn't thought of a scanner mouse before. The included software is OK but I found that some additional editing of the images was required using another software package.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man Mike

customer_reviews.title: Useless, just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Useless, it just does scan. The mouse is to big to get to text in the folds of a book. Even when it does scan it isn't usable it jumps all over the the place so no text is actually legible. I have returned.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: good simple hand held scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my windows 10 laptop for simple scanning.
customer_reviews.author: ncr d.

customer_reviews.title: Magical mouse lol but it's a lil bit hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Magical mouse lol but it's a lil bit hard to scan cause I need to move it really careful and sometime the edge of the picture is hard to be scanned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fantastic scanner and fun. Edit what you have scanned.
customer_reviews.author: ippolitto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have a scanner in your hand works well.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: fabulous product and so good for scanning photos in an album where you cant remove them
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic item a must have for any family or business
customer_reviews.author: Davy boy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product NOT recommended. Problematic with installation. Tried to communicate with IRIS not helpful at all! Totally not recommended especially for its money as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty installing on my laptop running Win7 but after much ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficulty installing on my laptop running Win7 but after much cursing changed the compatability mode XP. It now runs reasonably well but does take a lot of practice.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift im sure it will be great fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift im sure it will be great fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly loves shopping

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit once you have mastered the scanning mouse,be patient you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Evans

customer_reviews.title: value for money???
customer_reviews.text: its only good for name cards, rather misleading that it can be used for scanning A4 papge document. The company does not provide OCR software for turning scanned doc to texts.
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy. Interesting gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son doing GCSC. He just loves it. He can scan the questions (and/or pictures) in his book, add it One Note (Microsoft Office) and writes the answers along side each question. Does the job it says.
customer_reviews.author: Nagarajan Sudhakar

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly simple and easy to use... maybe even fun!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: + Works great on Windows 10. + Quick setup process. + Scanning a small document takes less than 20 seconds from start to finish. + Great quality images. + Color is good. + Lightweight. + Built-in editing tools is great and super fast. CONS: + Scanning large documents feels clunky and slower than a traditional scanner. VERY VERY fast and easy to use for smaller documents such as receipts, playing cards, business cards, photos sticky notes, etc. Much faster than trying to use a traditional scanner for these kinds of things. Also great if you only care to scan a tiny portion of a larger document.
customer_reviews.author: Morisato

customer_reviews.title: I love this user friendly mouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this user friendly mouse. It doesn't come with much direction, but it was so user friendly that I soon discovered how it worked. I tried opening the software before activating the scanner and soon found that the software activates only once the scanner is in use. It is easy to crop and save the image where you want it. The choices are so clear. Finally I can scan old photos in albums and other items that would be difficult if not impossible to place in a scanner or run through a scanner. The hand motions in using the scanner take a little getting used to, but in no time, I felt comfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: NON-EXISTENT Technical or Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: NON-EXISTENT Technical or Customer Support: I purchased this hand scanner in February to use on OS X 10.11. The website indicated version 10.10 or better. The software installed, but never executed without bombing. I went to the technical support website and filed a request for support. All I wanted to know is whether there was driver software compatible with Apple's most recent OS X version. I received no response after two "trouble ticket" submissions. The customer support is non-existent!!!
customer_reviews.author: SuperCoder

customer_reviews.title: Will not work in Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Despite it being advertised as compatible with Windows, it is not compatible with Windows 10. I was unable to install it. The manufacturer's website states: "The issue with the IRIScan Mouse has been traced to an issue with the Anniversary Update. The problem is that after installing the update, Windows no longer allows USB webcams to use MJPEG or H264 enc..." This is true with other scanner mice I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Able Devildog

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and you can save in several different formats. Software does a decent job of putting it all together. Just have to be smooth & consistent with your motion. Too bad it does not come with a protective bag, just for that the executive version would be worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Good item and good price for it
customer_reviews.text: Good item and good price for it, this scanner is a very good idea, special for students who have to write reports from different sources. it saves time and money.
customer_reviews.author: M.Khaled75

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: A very cool device. The mouse works well and the scanner does a reasonably good job. It just needs some stitching software for those scans that have to be don in parts. I have an all-in-one printer/scanner at home, but this will help out when I am on the road with my laptop and can't drag a 300 pound printer with me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Graham

customer_reviews.title: ... the Windows machine but once functioning this is a great device and a must have for photographers
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of tweaking on the Windows machine but once functioning this is a great device and a must have for photographers!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT to use
customer_reviews.text: Be certain to keep scan page SOLID and STABLE. Use a clear plastic page cover for small stuff, GREAT to use.
customer_reviews.author: m e adams

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It is so awesome to use while i am in college online and having to submit pieces of information. Love love love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M-D F

customer_reviews.title: scan mouse
customer_reviews.text: Once set up this is fantastic. Cordless would be better. The driver software could be FAR easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: REVIEWED

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to program
customer_reviews.text: You have so manet days to download Programming Necessary for continued use. Without the program you got an expensive Mouse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved and has stolen it from me - works great ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to install on Windows 10 correctly. Took a bit to get used to using it. My husband loved and has stolen it from me - works great on his Windows 7 laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Aschie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectations and it works beautifully. It's portable, easy to use and it saved a lot of space on my desk!
customer_reviews.author: CEJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some time it is hard to scan paper. It take some time getting use to
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: so bad product
customer_reviews.text: IT can not used. I just keep it as a lesson for me...
customer_reviews.author: Quoc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a very cool scanner and so easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple spot scanning and a mouse!
customer_reviews.text: I use it as my laptop mouse and like the "scan to dropbox" feature. Every piece of info I want to save (recipe, excerpts or articles) is scanned to dropbox so I can retrieve them from wherever. Really useful! I hope a wireless version will come one day even if the wire does not bother me. It can only be used for one document at a time but does it swiftly and precisely. I showed it to my students and the real time scanning has impressed them very much. Great product overall. Very little can go wrong which is why I gave it a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel36

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it says
customer_reviews.text: Great for those things that won't fit in a scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product. I won't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It is not doing as it supposed to. Not one document scanned properly. Very poor product. I won't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: macmylife

customer_reviews.title: Good for thick books that don't lie flat. Haven't compared to Iphone pic and OCR.
customer_reviews.text: I like this scanner mouse. It's a big improvement over previous versions. Takes a little practice.
customer_reviews.author: Ben V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am able to create faster workloads with this software.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth porter

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust this company, makes junk products
customer_reviews.text: This Company's products are complete junk, from the software they make to the physical products they make, it's all junk. I bought an IrisScan 5 book thinking it would an improvement over the IRIScan Book 3 models and it wasn't. The product broke down after 3 days. When I tried to return, they harassed me over email telling me I needed to recalibrate machine, and refused to honor my request for a refund multiple times telling me to recalibrate the machine and arguing with me. I had to file a credit card claim on this company in order to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: HonestFeedback

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Mac OS X
customer_reviews.text: Don't miss the caveat in the description that this product is not supported on OS X Catalina. So if you have updated your Mac in the past year, this product will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: John White

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Satisfied by this products
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Satisfied by this products, forget to scan 100 pages ! but for ad hoc scanning, it's great! I scan test of my son, it works great and did not have any issues, scan to JPG, scan to pdf and scan to word just works! and i do not understand some bad reviews i read, on my side it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BiBuB - Bruxelles

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product. It scanned sections randomly though I updated ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. It scanned sections randomly though I updated software for my system either Mac or Windows, it never worked. Don't waste your money in this peace of garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Efrï¿½n Beltrï¿½n Sï¿½nchez

product_meta.title: IRIScan Executive 2 Portable Scanning Mouse
product_meta.description:
Style:Compatible with Windows and MacScanner & Mouse, all-in-one & OCR 
Scanning in just a single click
Scan documents, newspapers, business cards, receipts, up to A4 format
Edit scanned texts directly into Word, Pages, Excel, PDF
PC and Mac compatible, not catalina 64bits !
feature_bullets: Scan any document, newspaper, contract, picture and many more, up to A4
Amazing Mouse & scanner functionnality, ideal to scan any part of documents, business cards, receipts
Ideal to scan part documents into full Microsoft Word
Export any documents to Cloud : Dropbox, Evernote
A Mouse and a Scanner : a unique device will save you a lot of time with professional software
Bonus : companion software included with 138 OCR Languages
Bonus 2 : companion software IRIS Cardiris to scan & edit & export all your business cards to Outlook
